headline: iHeartMedia Announces the Return of House of Music Presented by Hyundai at the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Festival Presented by Capital One
summary: NEW YORK, August 28, 2025--iHeartMedia today announced the return of the House of Music presented by Hyundai, a dynamic fan experience inspired by the artists performing at the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Festival presented by Capital One including Ed Sheeran, LL COOL J, Mariah Carey, Maroon 5, Tate McRae and more. Fans are invited to make themselves at home as they explore over 12 interactive rooms, immersing themselves in the lives, music and passions of their favorite artists and brands. The exper
